title: Marlborough Sounds Five-Star Apartments with Indigenous-Inspired Day Spas
description: The beauty of Marlborough Sounds is best enjoyed from the secluded and serene Bay of Many Coves Resort, a sanctuary from the everyday. Sandwiched between the bush and the sea, the five-star resort boasts pristine natural landscapes that are best enjoyed from the privacy of your apartment's sun-dappled deck, over a long lunch at The Kumatage lounge, or with a glass of delicious Marlborough Sounds sauvignon blanc at the waterfront The Quarterdeck Lounge.
offer_address: The Bay of Many Coves, Queen Charlotte Sound, Private Bag 382, Picton 7250 New Zealand
